description: Assisted with cybersecurity and security engineering processes.
Assisted with strategic projects in the Industry Product Engineering department. Helped improve project management and operational processes.
Reviewed and improved the security of web applications. Created guidelines to help software teams write safer code.
Worked on systems for storing data and creating digital models of materials. Contributed to research in testing methods and analysis.
Worked on identifying security issues and participated in team discussions. Gained hands-on experience in cybersecurity practices.
Learned how to use AWS cloud services like EC2 and S3. Worked on setting up cloud systems and securing data.
Helped maintain and improve websites. Built and deployed web applications and managed Discord bots.
Assisted in improving websites and fixing issues. Worked with a team to develop and launch web applications.
